chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: &pkglint; is a static analysis tool for pkgsrc packages. It finds many errors and problematic issues in those packages. Starting in June 2004, &pkglint; has evolved into a powerful tool that gives precise warnings wherever possible. With that power comes much additional complexity, which cannot be understood from reading the source code alone. This document provides the necessary background information to understand what the actual code does and why it is done this way.
